name: AIm (Huskslay)
description:
For Wowie Jam 4.0 made in just over 3 days

Control the player on the right to collect wrenches to repair your AI friend on the left

Bullets will try to hit and destroy the AI so to avoid them the AI will copy your movements at all times

Control the player to not only collect wrenches but also dodge where the bullets are on the AI's side so they do not get hit

(It is recommended to focus your vision on the AI to avoid the bullets and see where the wrenches are to be collected out of the corner of your eye)
